outboundMessages.description: sends a message from Conga Composer to the customer who placed it.
outboundMessages.name: Conga Execution for New Gas Choice Order

rules.fullName: API Error Notification %28Bounce%2C New Leaf%2C First Choice%2C Direct
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Order_Status__c , "API Error") , ISPICKVAL( Order_Status__c , "API Exception")), OR( REP_Profile__r.Name = "Bounce Energy", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Direct Energy", REP_Profile__r.Name = "New Leaf Energy", REP_Profile__r.Name = "First Choice Power" ) )
AND( REP_Profile__r.Name = "Bounce Energy", Rate__r.RecordTypeId = "012300000017ce9")

rules.description: Customer asks CNP to cancel order--this confirms that we completed it.

rules.fullName: Champion - Pending deposit orders close after 12 days
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL( Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit") , REP_Profile__r.Id = "a0P30000007FIBd")

AND(OR( REP_Profile__c ="a0P30000008QjIT", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Cirro Energy"), OR(REPOrderSubStatus__c ="AA", REPStatus__c ="Approved"), ISBLANK(InitialDateofService__c ), RecordTypeId <> "012300000018SzH")

AND(No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, OR( REP_Profile__c ="a0P30000008QjIT", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Cirro Energy"), OR(REPOrderSubStatus__c ="AA", REPStatus__c ="Approved"), NOT(ISBLANK(InitialDateofService__c )))

rules.fullName: Clear null null on Authorized Representative
rules.description: If no Authorized Representative is listed on the Order, clear "null null"

rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c, "Approved Pending Confirmation"), NOT(ISNULL( InitialDateofService__c )), RecordType.Name = "Electric Order" , OR(REP_Profile__r.Name = "First Choice Power", REP_Profile__r.Name = "New Leaf Energy", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Direct Energy", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Bounce Energy") )

rules.fullName: Conga Execution for New Gas Choice Orders

rules.description: What events happen when a REP marks an order status as "failed"

if the record is success, change status to pending. If it was none (in the workflow) this now creates the positions. This does not handle bulk inserts, where you should flip the status manually. This is only for approval-process based orders.

rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c,"New/Successfully Submitted"), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", Plan__r.Renewable_Content__c > 90 )

rules.fullName: New Gaston Gas Choice Temporary Order
rules.formula:
AND(
not(Premise__r.SG_Do_Not_Call__c) ,
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c, "Gas Choice Temporary"), OR( Right(Name, 1)="0", Right(Name, 1)="2", Right(Name, 1)="4" ) ) )

rules.fullName: New Lazaro Gas Choice Temporary Order
rules.formula:
AND(
not(Premise__r.SG_Do_Not_Call__c) ,
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c, "Gas Choice Temporary"), OR( Right(Name, 1)="7", Right(Name, 1)="9" ) ) )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 and 8
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 and 8 and 9
1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9

rules.fullName: New Order Critical Care %28Customer AND REP%29

rules.description: make sure it's the correct picklist value

rules.fullName: New Sheree Gas Choice Temporary Order
rules.formula:
AND(
not(Premise__r.SG_Do_Not_Call__c) ,
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c, "Gas Choice Temporary"), OR( Right(Name, 1)="1", Right(Name, 1)="3", Right(Name, 1)="5" ) ) )

rules.fullName: New Shirley Gas Choice Temporary Order
rules.formula:
AND(
not(Premise__r.SG_Do_Not_Call__c) ,
AND ( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c, "Gas Choice Temporary"), OR( Right(Name, 1)="6", Right(Name, 1)="8" ) ) )

rules.fullName: On order Approval %28pending confirmation%29 no switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Energy Rewards", No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Confirmation"), ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: On order Approval %28pending confirmation%29 with switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Energy Rewards", No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Confirmation"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: On order Approval %28pending deposit%29 no switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order and a deposit is needed
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit"), ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: On order Approval %28pending deposit%29 with switch date V2
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name <> "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: On order Pending Deposit %28NO switch date%29 WITH CUSTOMER REMINDER
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order and a deposit is needed

rules.fullName: On order Pending Deposit %28with switch date%29 WITH ADMIN REMINDER
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need

criteriaItems.value: Pending Information,Approved Pending Deposit,Pending Switch Hold,New/Successfully Submitted
Pending Information,Approved Pending Deposit,Pending Switch Hold,New/Successfully Submitted

rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Exception__c)), Exception__c <> "SSN was found, but required deposit", RecordTypeId <> "012300000018SzH" )

rules.fullName: Order requires more Information from Customer

criteriaItems.value: Enroll Page - Complete,Plan Disclosures Page - Complete,Enroll Page - Started

rules.description: A customer enrolls in a plan but never finishes the process, and we ask them if they meant to submit it.

rules.fullName: Pending deposit orders abandoned after 21 days
rules.formula: ISPICKVAL( Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit")

rules.fullName: REP Customer Email CC - Summer Energy
rules.formula: AND(No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, REP_Profile__r.Name = "Summer Energy", NOT(ISBLANK(kWh_rate_1000__c)), NOT(ISBLANK( Order_Status_TS__c )) )

rules.description: Marks orders to status=rejected if REP fails to act in time

rules.fullName: REP Order Final Confirmation w%2F switch date
rules.description: Order has been pending confirmation for 48 hours after switch date, needs to be confirmed
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c ,"Approved pending confirmation"), NOT(ISBLANK( InitialDateofService__c )), RecordTypeId <> "012300000018SzH" )

rules.fullName: REP Order Final Confirmation w%2Fout switch date
rules.description: Order has been pending confirmation for 48 hours, needs to be confirmed
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c ,"Approved pending confirmation"), ISBLANK( InitialDateofService__c ), RecordTypeId <> "012300000018SzH")

rules.fullName: REP order notification and expiration warning
rules.description: Notifies the REP when an order is placed and reminds them 4 hours before it expires.

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending confirmation%29 no switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(Order_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Confirmation"), ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending confirmation%29 with move-in date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(Order_Status__c),ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Confirmation"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas", PMVI_Flag__c = TRUE)

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending confirmation%29 with switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(Order_Status__c),ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Confirmation"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas", PMVI_Flag__c = FALSE)

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending deposit%29 no switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order and a deposit is needed
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit"), ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas")

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending deposit%29 with move-in date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas", PMVI_Flag__c = TRUE )

rules.fullName: Source P%26G - On order Approval %28pending deposit%29 with switch date
rules.description: Runs when a REP approves an order, regardless of the deposit need
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Approved Pending Deposit"), NOT(ISNULL(InitialDateofService__c)), Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", REP_Profile__r.Name = "Source Power & Gas", PMVI_Flag__c = FALSE )

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 and 7

rules.description: Notify customers with prior orders through TrueCost when their contract is going to expire
rules.formula: AND( No_Workflows_or_Triggers__c = FALSE, Parent_Account__r.PersonHasOptedOutOfEmail = FALSE, Record_Type_Name__c <> "Gas Choice Sign Up", ISPICKVAL(Order_Status__c , "Confirmed") )

rules.fullName: Upper Case Name on CC Info
rules.formula: AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Name_as_it_appears_on_Payment_Card__c)), RecordTypeId <> "012300000018SzH")

rules.fullName: Verification code from SG is bad
rules.description: when we don't get a "big" verification code, we need to throw an error.
